entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Improve LoggerMessageGenerator parser to check for invalid partial method body when LoggerMessageAttribute is on method definition #75731
  • [API Proposal]: Create AppDomain.GetCurrentException #75729
  • Vector{128|256}.Narrow with saturation #75724
  • something about serialization #75720
  • [wasm] Update Wasm.Build.Tests to work with net8.0, and the updated SDK #75719
  • CI failure in JIT.HardwareIntrinsics WASM test Vector64_ro: SDK Microsoft.Build.NoTargets/3.5.0 could not be found #75714
  • Make Sure LLVM Zero Extends Word in JIT Mode #75712
    8.0.0
  • Update .NET 8 Unicode data to version 15.0.0 #75711
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] Perf regression of Span.IndexOf #75709
    8.0.0
  • LibraryImport analyzer crashes when encountering certain attributes #75706
  • Test failure: System.Net.Sockets.Tests.SelectTest.Select_ReadWrite_AllReady_ManySockets #75702
  • File.Copy(x, x, true) throws IOException, not documented #75701
  • net6.0-ios: AOT compiler fail when UnmanagedCallersOnly has CallConvs #75700
  • [iOS] XslCompiledTransform tests failing on devices #75699
    8.0.0
  • [MacOS][x86] mono immediately exits with debugger-agent error #75682
  • MarshallingAttributeAnalyzers throws InvalidCastException #75681
  • Consider setting hostRequirements for Codespaces #75680
    8.0.0
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'varDsc->IsAlwaysAliveInMemory() || ((regSet.GetMaskVars() & regMask) == 0) #75679
    8.0.0
  • dotnet command line argument --additional-deps (Windows and mac) #75670
  • NativeAOT can report wrong sizes of native structs #75666
    Future
  • [Perf] Windows/arm64: Regressions in System.Numerics.Tests.Perf_Plane #75686
  • Regressions in System.Buffers.Tests.RentReturnArrayPoolTests<Byte> #75690
  • BeginReceive Stack overflow Application crash #75660
  • Test failure JIT\\Directed\\StrAccess\\straccess1_cs_ro\\straccess1_cs_ro.cmd #75659
    8.0.0
  • Test failure JIT/Regression/JitBlue/Runtime_70790/Runtime_70790/Runtime_70790.sh #75657
    8.0.0
  • System.NullReferenceException when using System.Speech 7.0.0-rc.1.22426.10 from Windows Forms #75667
  • bug in IRootFunctions double.Hypot #75651

Closed

  • [NativeAOT] Implement `MethodTable::HasCriticalFinalizer` #75106
    Future
  • `[System.Console]::ReadKey()` returns escape sequence characters when pressing arrow keys in PowerShell on Linux #75305
    8.0.0
  • Options binding fails on get-only IDictionary<,> properties #75626
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] Wasm.Build.Tests failing on rolling builds with the new sdk supporting net8.0 #75684
  • FailFast event in the event log has broken address / error code #75600
    7.0.0
  • TripleDES Encryption in .NET 6 failure #70392
    Future
  • "Build Cross OS Linux-musl DAC for Windows" step failed in CI #58358
    Future
  • Massive failure tvOS - System.Xml #75697
  • [wasm] AOT tests failing due to an incorrect path for `ILLink.Descriptors.Serialization.xml` #75687
  • Question about Vectorize IndexOf for OrdinalIgnoreCase #75674
    Future
  • wasm massive failures - nuget unable to find packages #75691
  • [API Proposal]: List<T>.Slice #66773
    8.0.0
  • .NET AWS Lambda function using .NET 7 RC1 fails to start when using a custom runtime on AWS Linux 2 on arm64 #75622
  • Assertion failed '(parentLoop.lpFlags & LPFLG_REMOVED) == 0' during 'Assertion prop' #74773
    8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Compile Error on M1 Mac - Missing OSX-ARM64 Runtime Package #71622
    8.0.0
  • [Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting] BackgroundService ExecuteAsync can prevent app from stopping #65964
    Future
  • Test failure: WasmTestOnBrowser-System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles - Memory access out of bounds #75465
    8.0.0
  • System.AccessViolationException: Int128 ToString invalid memory reads and string interpolation crash #75656
  • Test failure: System.Security.Cryptography.Tests.HashAlgorithmTest.ComputeHashAsync_SupportsCancellation - no exception #75463

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove update to unit test for speech fix #75732
    blocking-clean-ci, area-System.Speech
  • [tests] Skip XslCompiledTransformApi tests on iOS, tvOS, and when testing native AOT #75730
  • [release/7.0-rc2] Fix edge cases of getting attribute data from syntax #75728
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Fix edge cases of getting attribute data from syntax #75727
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • [release/7.0-rc2] [wasm] Use newer helix images with updated v8 #75726
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/7.0] [wasm] Use newer helix images with updated v8 #75725
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/7.0-rc2] Fix Configuration.Binder for collection properties with no setters #75723
    Servicing-consider, area-Extensions-Configuration
  • [PERF][MAUI] Update 6.0 dotnet install quality #75722
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, perf-pipeline
  • Enable logging managed stack trace for AV to event log #75721
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Fix FailFast logging message #75718
    Servicing-consider
  • Updating inbox source generators to Roslyn 4.4 and removing polyfill approach #75717
  • [release/7.0-rc2] Handle a null szPname field #75716
    area-System.Speech
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0-rc2' => 'release/7.0' #75713
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [NativeAOT] QueryPerformanceCounter in Pal should use CLOCK_MONOTONIC #75708
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Removed branches in some UriHelper-methods by using a bitmask-approach #75705
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0-rc2] Try re-enabling System.Transactions.Local tests on Arm64 #75703
    area-System.Transactions
  • Fix wasm template README #75696
    community-contribution
  • Implement an AppContext compatibility switch re-enabling reflection fallback in STJ source generators. #75694
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Ensure Max/Min for floating-point on x86/x64 are not handled as commutative #75683
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] fix missing managed stack trace on managed exceptions marshaled to JS #75678
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, needs-author-action, 8.0.0
  • Fix x64 cross build on arm64 macOS #75677
    os-mac-os-x, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Update gtHasLocalsWithAddrOp to use GenTreeVisitor #75672
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Add option for truncated stream detection #75671
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] Fix System.Runtime.InteropServices tests #75669
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [NO-MERGE][Hackathon] Allow easy filtering which build legs run on a PR #75665
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix Dictionary perf regression for non-string ref type keys #75663
    area-System.Collections
  • Don't propagate const TYP_REF as TYP_I_IMPL #75661
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0

Merged

  • Handle a null szPname field #75695
    area-System.Speech
  • Add RID for alpine-3.17 + alpine-{armv6,x86,s390x,ppc64le} #75396
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] add support for CriticalFinalizerObject #75662
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Remove custom x64 check #75692
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Fix Configuration.Binder for collection properties with no setters #75689
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • Bump Intellisense RC2 package version again #75698
    documentation, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.0
  • Update fabricbot.json for Tellurium team #74480
    area-Meta
  • Fix FailFast logging message #75685
  • [release/7.0-rc2] Use determinism instead of timing in cancellation tests #75655
    area-System.Security, test-enhancement
  • Fix ILLink.Descriptors.Serialization.xml #75688
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Try re-enabling System.Transactions.Local tests on Arm64 #75610
    area-System.Transactions
  • Remove broken symlinks after building installers #75654
    area-Infrastructure, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Use sdk version `8.0.100-alpha.1.22463.23` #75693
    test-failure, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Implement List<T>.Slice #75383
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation
  • JIT: Print array types properly #75676
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Add signing infrastructure for diagnostic binaries #74330
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • don't run RedirectedOutput_EnvVarSet_EmitsAnsiCodes when RemoteExecutor is not supported #75664
    area-System.Console, 8.0.0
  • Implement an AppContext compatibility switch re-enabling reflection fallback in STJ source generators. #75615
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Bump release/7.0 version to GA #75649
    area-Infrastructure, 7.0.0
  • CI: Fix conditions for running mono, and coreclr jobs #75645
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Avoid unnecessary overflow check during div/mod on Arm64 (#46010) #75272
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Adjust the lpParent of "adopted" child loops #75218
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use determinism instead of timing in cancellation tests #75623
    area-System.Security, test-enhancement
  • Disable test for x86 #75624
    area-System.Numerics

Updated

  • Split Codespaces configuration based on development scenarios #74683
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Remove usages of Ubuntu 16.04 from pipelines #75513
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Fix LoggerMessageGenerator parser to check for expression bodied method #75601
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Add RID for alpine-3.17 + alpine-{x86,s390x} (backports #75396) #75530
    blocked, area-Host, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] Add RID for alpine-3.17 + alpine-{armv6,x86,s390x,ppc64le} (backports #75396) #75531
    blocked, area-Host, community-contribution
  • Updating Vector*.IsHardwareAccelerated to be recursive #69578
    area-System.Numerics, 7.0.0
  • [JIT] CodeGen verification testing #75102
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [IGNORE][wasm] testing some CI trigger changes #75555
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Avoid recommitting the mark array #75208
    area-GC-coreclr
  • WIP: [mono] Include inspection of CustomConstantAttribute when resolving default values for parameters via reflection #75612
    area-System.Reflection-mono
  • Improvements to CoreCLR Building, Debugging, and Testing Documentation #75569
    documentation, area-Meta
  • Extend RuntimeHelpers.IsBitwiseEquatable to more types #75640
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Enable CI for macOS x64/arm64 #75421
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [wasm] CI: Run all EAT tests on runtime pipeline #75516
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix numeric IntPtr behavioral changes analyzer findings #75557
    area-Meta
  • Adding zmmStateSupport and AVX512F, AVX512CD, AVX512BW, AVX512DQ and AVX512VL ISAs. #74113
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][tests] Fix System.Reflection.Tests.ModuleTests.GetField failing test on ARMv6 and Android #75458
    area-System.Reflection-mono
  • Pad the perm table to avoid array out of bound #75364
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Enable IDE0060 (Remove unused parameter) analyzer #72667
    area-Meta
  • source-build: support building runtime using non-portable runtime packages. #75597
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • emit branchless form of (i >= 0 && j >= 0)/(i!=0&& j!= 0) for signed integers #62689
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Join the special sweep decision #75572
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [MONO][DRAFT] Move Marshal-ilgen into a component #75542
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [Mono][Test] Collapse mono runtime tests into single builds using global-build-job template #62863
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [WIP] Support hot cold splitting in crossgen2 #74963
    NO-MERGE, area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Update System.Formats.Tar docs #75386
    documentation, area-System.IO
  • Add doc for CET compatibility. #75551
  • Implement DivRem intrinsic for X86 #66551
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] enable issue 58812 #75444
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Add Vector128 AndNot intrinsic for amd64 #74586
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • JIT: Support delegate GDV guards in loop cloning #75140
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Fix distribute free regions #74916
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [mono] Add Vector128 Negate and OnesComplement intrinsics for amd64 #74993
    NO-MERGE, area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • JIT: Enhance metrics reported by superpmi diffs #74584
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Add QuicError.AlpnInUse member #74754
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic, 8.0.0
  • Gradual decommit in wks #73620
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Arm64: Add If conversion pass #73472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Early expand vtable calls on ARM32 too #75604
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Evaluate GDV call args early #75634
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Make WriteCommentValue() overloads have same behavior. #75074
    area-System.Text.Json, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • Add char[] buffer to XmlRawWriter. #75411
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • Implement IEEE754 totalOrder comparer #75517
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Try enabling regions for native AOT. #69108
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Nullable annotations for System.Security.Cryptography.Xml #67198
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Manually backporting #74599 #75648
    area-Serialization, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Fix binary serialization of DateTime with DCS and add test. #75650
    area-Serialization, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Allow for null XmlSerialziers when loading pre-gen from mappings. #75638
    area-Serialization, new-api-needs-documentation, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Bring back readability lost in .Net 6, and stop emitting BOM. #75637
    area-Serialization, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Fix `DataContractJsonSerializer`'s handling of -0.0 #75643
    area-Serialization, 6.0.x
  • Free getline buffer after use #74899
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Address Sanitizer support in CoreCLR #74623
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, tenet-reliability, area-Infrastructure
  • Allocate RuntimeType objects on Frozen Object Heap #75573
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
